recipe

? (Popcorn/Salt/Olive Oil/Dash Seasoning Data Missing) Calories

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 5 Minutes

Put 1 tbsp Olive Oil in pot
Put in 3 Popcorn kernels
Timer 4.5 minutes Turn stove to heat 5
Once 3 kernels pop, turn stove to heat 4
Put in 4 tbsps Popcorn
Cook until popped (write this down)
Season with Dash Seasoning Salt
